Touchscreen: A touchscreen wristwatch can make it easier to interact with the watch and access its features.
GPS: A wristwatch with GPS can help track location and provide navigation assistance.
Waterproof: A waterproof wristwatch can be worn while swimming, snorkeling, or engaging in other water activities.
Customizable watch faces: A wristwatch with customizable watch faces can be personalized to fit the individual's style and preferences.
Voice assistant: A wristwatch with a built-in voice assistant can make it easier to access information and control other devices hands-free.
